(2) Partner card click redirects to /coach/{username} via hash routing. (3) BecomeCoachPage accessible via #become-coach with 'Se connecter avec Google' button for new users. (4) Coach vitrine has clean hero video with NO text overlay - only 'RÃ©server mon cours' button. (5) /api/partners/active returns partners with video_url field.
